snippet.title: Who Needs Half-Life 3 ?! ★ Half-Life 2: KILL THE MONK - Full Walkthrough
snippet.description:
This is the funniest HL2 Mod I've ever played... EVER!  It's amazing!

★★★ Please SUBSCRIBE, LIKE and SHARE ★★★ Thanks :)

Join us on: 
Discord:► https://halflife.chat
Twitter:► http://twitter.com/Bolloxed_Potato

You can download Half-Life 2 Kill the Monk for free here:
https://www.moddb.com/mods/kill-the-monk
